ResearchProjectDef.label: Basic Conveyor Networks
ResearchProjectDef.description: The continual movement of raw resources and final products within a factory is tedious, but crucial. Understanding the fundamentals of conveyor networks is very important to fulfill manufacturing needs and to determine production rates.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Basic Sorting Systems
ResearchProjectDef.description: The sorting of products and raw resources can benefit a factory in many ways. The construction of basic sorting systems and integrating them along your machines will greatly improve general factory organization and efficiency, eliminating confusion which can present itself during mass production.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced Sorting Systems
ResearchProjectDef.description: Improving on current sorting networks will further increase the organization of resources within your factory with the addition of more complex upgrades.
